gst.ui

Class MainWindow.MainWindowMouseForwarder

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • gst.ui.NamedMouseAdapter
        • gst.ui.MainWindow.MainWindowMouseForwarder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    MainWindow
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
private class MainWindow.MainWindowMouseForwarder
extends NamedMouseAdapter
    MouseAdapter for the main window forwards the mouse events to it's child components.
    Version:
    0.1 (30.07.2012)
    Author:
    Enrico Grunitz

      • forward

        private boolean forward(java.awt.event.MouseEvent event)
        Deprecated. 
        Tries to forward the MouseEvent to the deepest displayed Component.
        Parameters:
        event - the MouseEvent to forward
        Returns:
        true if forward is successful, false if deepest Component is MainWindow
